query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS student_equipped_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  itemId INT NOT NULL,
  slot ENUM('hat', 'glasses', 'accessory', 'background') NOT NULL,
  equippedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_slot (studentId, slot)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS student_equipped_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  itemId INT NOT NULL,
  slot ENUM('hat', 'glasses', 'accessory', 'background') NOT NULL,
  equippedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_slot (studentId, slot)
)
